snippet: Mattress Firm said that it had agreed to buy the owner of the mattress retailer Sleepy’s for about $780 million.
abstract: Mattress Firm says it agrees to acquire owner of mattress retailer Sleepy's for about $780 million.
lead_paragraph: Mattress Firm said that it had agreed to buy the owner of the mattress retailer Sleepy’s for about $780 million.

headline.main: Mattress Firm to Acquire Sleepy’s Parent Company
headline.print_headline: Mattress Firm to Acquire Sleepy’s Parent Company
